# Scripts

Bundled resources for test-coverage-analyzer skill

- [x] analyze_coverage.py: Script to execute coverage analysis using a specified coverage tool (e.g., coverage.py, nyc) and threshold.
- [x] generate_report.py: Script to generate a detailed coverage report in various formats (e.g., HTML, XML, text).
- [x] find_untested_code.py: Script to identify specific lines or functions of code that lack test coverage.
